What is often lost in the #EqualPay debate is that women of color earn even less than white women. Today is #BlackWomenEqualPay Day. Black women only earn $0.61 for every dollar a white man makes. We need equal pay for equal work for ALL women now.

Not vaccinating migrants puts them at risk, especially in overcrowded conditions. We all benefit from a healthier population, and we put our communities at risk when we fail to take basic steps to protect public health.

This policy of not offering influenza immunizations to migrants is shortsighted and dangerous. Last year, three children died from complications of the flu. This is a preventable illness. https://www.cnbc.com/2019/08/20/the-us-wont-vaccinate-migrant-children-against-the-flu-at-border-camps.html …

Barring these Representatives is an affront to free speech, and I hope that Mr. Netanyahu will reconsider

I hope that when my colleagues are able to visit Israel, they take the opportunity to meet with people from multiple backgrounds and perspectives in order to get a more complete picture of this complex region.

The decision by our President and by Prime Minister Netanyahu to bar admission to Israel for two of my fellow congresswomen is wrong. Going to Israel is one of the best ways to get a sense of the nuances of the current Israeli and Palestinian conflict.
